title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.2 - Damaging, marking or defacing authority property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.2 - Damaging, marking or defacing authority property

State Regulations

No person shall damage, mark or deface any structure or
appurtenance owned or under the control of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
606.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
